book-course.title: Book a course
book-course.not-enough-spaces: There aren't enough spaces left for the quantity you want to book.
book-course.notice: Please make sure email(s) is entered correctly. Course registration details will be sent to email address(es).
book-course.repeat-own-email: If you are making a booking for yourself, please reconfirm your email address
book-course.review-tnc: I confirm I and/or those individuals added as registrants on this course will attend even if it starts during my 14 day cancellation period. I understand that I will lose my right to cancel the contract once the course is complete and that I must pay for services provided prior to cancellation.
book-course.pay-by-cc: Pay by credit card (Corporate Card only)
book-course.pay-by-cc-info:
Payment by credit card allows you to secure your registration(s) immediately.

After you confirm your order you will be taken to a secure page where you can pay online with an additional charge of 1.4% + 20p per transaction.

*Team Teach Limited holds no liability if a consumer card is used.
book-course.pay-by-inv-info: Please note that payment is due at least 8 weeks before the course begins. If the course begins less than 8 weeks, then payment is due immediately.
book-course.order-success-info: Your order has been successfully submitted:
book-course.order-success-msg: Each attendee will receive an email with the necessary course instructions once this order has been processed and approved.
book-course.payment-cc-title: Pay by Credit Card (Corporate Card only)
book-course.payment-cc-subtitle: Enter your card details below and press pay now to finalise your order
book-course.payment-cc-error-PAYMENT_NOT_SUCCEEDED: Your payment has failed. Please try again later.
book-course.payment-cc-error_GENERIC_ERROR: There was an issue processing your payment. Please try again later.
book-course.error-creating-order: There was an error placing the order.

new-course.description: To submit a course, choose from the modules available to create a course {{duration}} hours in duration. Times indicated on the modules are the minimum recommended duration for each.
new-course.description-INTERMEDIATE_TRAINER: To submit this course, please accept that you will deliver all modules and techniques highlighted below within a 5 day duration.
new-course.description-INTERMEDIATE_TRAINER-reaccre: To submit this course, please accept that you will deliver all modules and techniques highlighted below within a 2 day duration.
new-course.warning-dialog: Please be aware once you submit this course, this cannot be changed
new-course.time-commitment-message: By submitting this course, you commit to at least {{hours}} hours of training.
new-course.course-type-indirect-info:
Additional intermediate modules that are not listed would need to be delivered as part of Level Two course.

If these modules are required, you will need to resubmit the course as a Level Two.
new-course.course-level-one-info:
Additional holds that are not listed above, will fall under the Level Two certification. If these are required, the course will need to be resubmitted as a Level Two.

Please contact Team Teach at
new-course.course-level-one-note: Please note: It may not effect your delivery timings.

form.health-leaflet-copy: I confirm that I will ensure all course registrants have read the Health Guidance & Training Information.

create-course.order-your-workbooks: Please click <0>here</0> if you have not ordered your workbooks for this course

exceptions.no-approval-header: This course does not require approval from a Team Teach administrator. This is a warning to highlight this course does not meet protocol for reasons:
exceptions.approval-header: This course requires approval from a Team Teach Administrator due to some or all of the following reasons:
exceptions.type_OUTSIDE_NOTICE_PERIOD: Start date is less than 4 weeks away
exceptions.type_LEAD_TRAINER_IN_GRACE_PERIOD: Lead trainer certification is expired (within grace period) or expiring soon
exceptions.type_TRAINER_RATIO_NOT_MET: Insufficient amount of trainers per participants
exceptions.no-exceptions-message: This course does not meet training protocols. Please contact a Team Teach Administrator if you wish to discuss further.

cancellation-modal.title: Cancel this entire course
cancellation-modal.description-p-1: This action will permanently cancel the course and notify all trainers, registered attendees, and organisations.
cancellation-modal.description-p-2: Finance will make changes on the invoice(s), where necessary.
cancellation-modal.description-p-3: Registered attendees will not incur cancellation charges.

reasons.booking-amendments-made-by-team-teach: Booking amendments made by Team Teach

cancellation-modal.cannot-be-undone-confirmation: I understand this cannot be undone.

registrants-cancellation-modal.description:
There are still registrants on this course. Have you transferred all registered attendees first?

Proceeding to cancel will cancel attendees off this course. If you would like to transfer registered attendees to another course instead, please change this per attendee in course details.

review-changes-modal.title: Review and confirm changes
review-changes-modal.description: This will change immediately and notify all trainers, organisation admins, and registered attendees of changes made to this course.
review-changes-modal.protocol-not-met: Courses can only be rescheduled to begin later than 2 weeks from today’s date. If you need the course rescheduled to a sooner date, please contact Team Teach at <0>{{email}}</0> for review.
review-changes-modal.protocol-not-met-sales-admin: This change does not meet Team Teach protocols, only TT Admin can action this change

grading-details-confirmation.line1: You are now at the end of your course and need to prepare for grading.

grading.description: Grade attendees individually, in multiples, or altogether as a group. Please note, grading details may not be modified once you’ve begun grading.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Team Teach Hub
welcome.get-started-description: Our handy getting started guides explain how to use every part of the Team Teach Hub with simple step-by-step guides and videos. You’ll find all our getting started resources in your profile area. Just click on your profile picture to find them.
welcome.message: A message from our Global Director
welcome.body: Welcome to the Team Teach family! At the centre of everything we do is the belief that all behaviour is communication. It’s wonderful to have you here with us so we can work together to best support the individuals in our care.
